languages.text: На саркофаге изображен человек, но по пропорциям тела и элементам ксеносских узоров очевидно, что тут похоронен эльдар. Понятно, почему могилу решили скрыть от глаз. Вероятно, сей ксенос был дорог одному из Вольных Торговцев.

At first glance, the sarcophagus depicts a man, but you can tell by the body proportions and designs of xenos origin that an Aeldari is buried here. It is small wonder that his resting place was hidden from sight. This xenos must have been someone important to one of the Rogue Traders.
languages.original_text: На саркофаге изображен человек, но по пропорциям тела и элементам ксеносских узоров очевидно, что тут похоронен эльдар. Понятно, почему могилу решили скрыть от глаз. Вероятно, сей ксенос был дорог одному из Вольных Торговцев.

traits.locale_text: At first glance, the sarcophagus depicts a man, but you can tell by the body proportions and designs of xenos origin that an Aeldari is buried here. It is small wonder that his resting place was hidden from sight. This xenos must have been someone important to one of the Rogue Traders.

At first glance, the sarcophagus depicts a man, but you can tell by the body proportions and designs of xenos origin that an Aeldari is buried here. It is small wonder that his resting place was hidden from sight. This xenos must have been someone important to one of the Rogue Traders.

At first glance, the sarcophagus depicts a man, but you can tell by the body proportions and designs of xenos origin that an Aeldari is buried here. It is small wonder that his resting place was hidden from sight. This xenos must have been someone important to one of the Rogue Traders.

At first glance, the sarcophagus depicts a man, but you can tell by the body proportions and designs of xenos origin that an Aeldari is buried here. It is small wonder that his resting place was hidden from sight. This xenos must have been someone important to one of the Rogue Traders.

At first glance, the sarcophagus depicts a man, but you can tell by the body proportions and designs of xenos origin that an Aeldari is buried here. It is small wonder that his resting place was hidden from sight. This xenos must have been someone important to one of the Rogue Traders.

languages.text: À première vue, la silhouette représentée sur le sarcophage est celle d'un homme, mais les proportions de son corps et les motifs xénos indiquent clairement qu'un Aeldari est enterré ici. Vous comprenez mieux pourquoi son dernier lieu de repos a été ainsi dissimulé aux yeux de tous. Ce xénos devait être important pour l'un des libres-marchands.
languages.original_text: At first glance, the sarcophagus depicts a man, but you can tell by the body proportions and designs of xenos origin that an Aeldari is buried here. It is small wonder that his resting place was hidden from sight. This xenos must have been someone important to one of the Rogue Traders.

traits.locale_text: À première vue, la silhouette représentée sur le sarcophage est celle d'un homme, mais les proportions de son corps et les motifs xénos indiquent clairement qu'un Aeldari est enterré ici. Vous comprenez mieux pourquoi son dernier lieu de repos a été ainsi dissimulé aux yeux de tous. Ce xénos devait être important pour l'un des libres-marchands.

languages.text: A primera vista, el sarcófago muestra en relieve a un hombre, pero, a partir de sus proporciones corporales y los diseños xenos, deduces que aquí yace un Aeldari. No es de extrañar que su lugar de descanso esté oculto. Este xenos debe de haber sido alguien importante para alguno de los Comerciantes Independientes.
languages.original_text: At first glance, the sarcophagus depicts a man, but you can tell by the body proportions and designs of xenos origin that an Aeldari is buried here. It is small wonder that his resting place was hidden from sight. This xenos must have been someone important to one of the Rogue Traders.

traits.locale_text: A primera vista, el sarcófago muestra en relieve a un hombre, pero, a partir de sus proporciones corporales y los diseños xenos, deduces que aquí yace un Aeldari. No es de extrañar que su lugar de descanso esté oculto. Este xenos debe de haber sido alguien importante para alguno de los Comerciantes Independientes.

languages.text: 乍看之下，棺柩的盖子上刻着的是个瘦高的男人，但从这个人的身材比例与充满异形风格的服装可以看出，这里埋葬着一位艾达灵族。难怪这个人的安息之地要藏得这么隐蔽。这位艾达灵族肯定是某位行商浪人非常重要的人。
languages.original_text: At first glance, the sarcophagus depicts a man, but you can tell by the body proportions and designs of xenos origin that an Aeldari is buried here. It is small wonder that his resting place was hidden from sight. This xenos must have been someone important to one of the Rogue Traders.

traits.locale_text: 乍看之下，棺柩的盖子上刻着的是个瘦高的男人，但从这个人的身材比例与充满异形风格的服装可以看出，这里埋葬着一位艾达灵族。难怪这个人的安息之地要藏得这么隐蔽。这位艾达灵族肯定是某位行商浪人非常重要的人。

languages.text: 一見したところ、石棺には男性が描かれているが、体のプロポーションや異星人由来のデザインから、ここにアエルダリが埋葬されていることがわかる。彼の眠る場所が人目につかないように隠されていたのも不思議ではない。この異星人はローグトレーダーにとって重要な人物だったに違いない。
languages.original_text: At first glance, the sarcophagus depicts a man, but you can tell by the body proportions and designs of xenos origin that an Aeldari is buried here. It is small wonder that his resting place was hidden from sight. This xenos must have been someone important to one of the Rogue Traders.

traits.locale_text: 一見したところ、石棺には男性が描かれているが、体のプロポーションや異星人由来のデザインから、ここにアエルダリが埋葬されていることがわかる。彼の眠る場所が人目につかないように隠されていたのも不思議ではない。この異星人はローグトレーダーにとって重要な人物だったに違いない。

languages.text: Auf den ersten Blick ist auf dem Sarcophagus ein Mann abgebildet, doch du erkennst an den Proportionen des Körpers und den Xenos-Symbolen, dass hier ein Aeldari begraben liegt. Es ist kein Wunder, dass seine letzte Ruhestätte versteckt wurde. Dieser Xenos war einem der Freihändler offenbar sehr wichtig.
languages.original_text: At first glance, the sarcophagus depicts a man, but you can tell by the body proportions and designs of xenos origin that an Aeldari is buried here. It is small wonder that his resting place was hidden from sight. This xenos must have been someone important to one of the Rogue Traders.

traits.locale_text: Auf den ersten Blick ist auf dem Sarcophagus ein Mann abgebildet, doch du erkennst an den Proportionen des Körpers und den Xenos-Symbolen, dass hier ein Aeldari begraben liegt. Es ist kein Wunder, dass seine letzte Ruhestätte versteckt wurde. Dieser Xenos war einem der Freihändler offenbar sehr wichtig.

languages.text: Lahit, ilk bakışta bir insanı tasvir ediyor gibi görünse de vücut hatlarından ve zeno kökenli tasarımlardan anlıyorsun ki burada yatan bir Aeldari. İstirahatgâhının gözlerden uzak tutulması şaşırtıcı değil. Bu zeno, Hür Tacirlerden biri için önemli olmalı.
languages.original_text: At first glance, the sarcophagus depicts a man, but you can tell by the body proportions and designs of xenos origin that an Aeldari is buried here. It is small wonder that his resting place was hidden from sight. This xenos must have been someone important to one of the Rogue Traders.
